title: 如何解决mod过多造成的物品ID数量不足？
author: weidan02123
txt_content: 附关键部分崩溃报告---- Minecraft Crash Report ----// This is a token for 1 free hug. Redeem at your nearest Mojangsta: [~~HUG~~] Time: 17-3-10 下午9:05Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail cpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.RuntimeException: Invalid id 9271 - maximum id range exceeded.        at

replies.author: 浅念哥
replies.txt_content:
一个伟大的mod      --------------     NotEnoughIDs
1.7.10最新版：http://pan.baidu.com/s/1qYEYPM8
原帖：https://mods.curse.com/mc-mods/minecraft/235107-notenoughids
功能：增加ID至32000
作者称可能与一些mod不兼容，并且旧地图会报出警告。
建议先备份地图，再使用此mod。

replies.author: weidan02123
replies.txt_content: 已解决 我觉得这是爱情
